attributes.additional_details:
Good afternoon

I wanted to draw your attention to this important petition that I recently signed:

"Firstplus must reduce interest rates."
http://www.ipetitions.com/petition/firstplusinterestrates

Whilst it is a different site the issue is nonetheless relevant. It is completely unacceptable that when mortgages came down and rates were held at an all time low, FirstPlus actually applied a rate increase and at no point has it ever brought those rates down

Yet I suspect if rates were to rise in future, they would be quick to increase theirs

Completely unethical
